title: Tammy Hembrow flaunts curves as she poses for sweet pool picture with her son
text:
Tammy Hembrow is known for flaunting her figure.

And the influencer has stripped off to her bikini again as she poses for a poolside picture with her little boy.

Taking to Instagram on Sunday, the 25-year-old model shared the sweet snap of herself and her four-year-old son Wolf enjoying the good weather.

Sweet! Tammy Hembrow (pictured) stripped off to her bikini again as she posed for a poolside picture with her little boy Wolf

She captioned the photograph: 'We love pool days at grandmas house.'

In the photo, she can be seen cuddling up to her fair-haired son as he wraps his arms around her neck.

She wore a strapless leopard print bikini, showing off her deep tan and famous curves.

Terrific trio! Tammy regularly gushes about her children on social media, and she recently said motherhood had changed her for the better. Pictured with Wolf and Saskia

Wolf looked pool ready in his striped swimming trunks.

Behind them, a gorgeous turquoise pool glimmered invitingly against the blue sky.

Tammy, who is based on the Gold Coast, shares her son Wolf and daughter Saskia, three, with ex-fiancé, Reece Hawkins.

Dedicated: Tammy, who is based on the Gold Coast, shares her son Wolf and daughter Saskia, three, with ex-fiancé, Reece Hawkins

She regularly gushes about her children on social media, and she recently said motherhood had changed her for the better.

She wrote: 'When you become a mother you no longer belong to yourself.

'You give everything you have for these tiny humans but they give you so much more in return.'

'My babies you make me stronger, better, more patient. The deepest love I've ever known.'
description: Tammy Hembrow is known for flaunting her figure.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
